评论详情: Its comfortable and soft and looks great.
Well made, and very well received by my adult son.

I really like FU's products. They are all soft, warm, fabrics are as-advertised, brilliant colours, and functional. I bought this one in blue and was surprised (pleasantly) that the logos and designs on the back and arms aren't black or gray, but white. Pockets don't allow your keys, phone, or wallet an easy escape. It's getting cold here, and the hoodie is warm enough for a quick 10-minute walk to the gym in the morning, and it's long enough to cover my backside in my workout clothes once in at the gym. I'm pleased with my purchase. The same item is cheaper on FU's website, but shipping is far more expensive.

评论概述: Great looking, great feeling, funny fit
评论详情: This is an amazing hoodie! The design looks just like it does in the picture. The outside fabric is solid, very resistant to the elements (wind and rain). The inside fabric is super soft, comfortable and warm. I SIZED UP AND HAVE TO RECOMMEND YOU DO AS WELL. I usually wear an XL, I got a XXL and it fits as well as it can. The Hood is extremely small for my head, not sure if it's the locs or what, but even putting on the hoodie over my head can be a struggle. Because of that it lost 1 star, but other than the hood area everything else is amazing!

评论概述: Great fit, great graphics, great weight
评论详情: I’m 5’7” and 180lbs, athletic build. The M was a perfect fit, just enough extra room without being baggy - I prefer fitted so order up if you want more room. The sweatshirt is a nice med/heavy weight that will keep you warm. Graphics are very clear and well made, no flaky edges or chunkiness that might peel off. Hopefully they hold up to long use and if so, definitely worth the price.

评论概述: I thought it the cat had pink highlights, the sweater came with red
评论详情: I like the overall fit and comfort of the hoodie, it looks really cool and will probably replace an older hoodie of mine. I thought the kitsune pattern had pink highlights, as the image online looks pinkish however, upon closer inspection it appears the color is washed out in the photo. It is white with red, and I really like it anyway.
My son loves this brand.

For 60-70 bucks this hoodie is pretty good. the look and feel of it makes it a comfortable hoodie to have its like a medium thick hoodie. I fit in L-XL sizes but the XL does feel similar to a large so keep that in mind. Haven’t washed it yet so will have to see how it holds up. Overall happy with it just choose a size up from normal fit.

评论概述: It's cool to a certain point
评论详情: The sweater looked great but I found some imperfections on which sucked. Just be aware buyers. I also have tried contacting them  through Facebook about I would have liked to get another size from another sweater I bought from them awhile ago but I never got a response back 😞.

评论概述: Looked Great For My Niche Purposes
评论详情: I absolutely love the design of this particular hoodie from Fabric of the Universe.  The Dragon theme of this is incredible and one of the more unique pieces I've seen offered from the company.  I model a lot of Techwear and like to put my own unique twists on them from time to time.  So I am a big fan of another company as well called Bad Dragon (I'm sure a lot of you know what that is lmao), and I thought this hoodie particular was ideal for a Techwear Bad Dragon themed cosplay design.  Hence my attached image was the final result of that idea coming to fruition.  My one thing I need to mention is that the Fabric of the Universe hoodies tend to run slightly smaller than your average USA sized hoodies, or at the very least they're slimmer fit.  I normally wear a USA Medium, but found that it was a bit too tight and needed the Large.  The Large fit me perfectly, so take that information for what you will.  But yeah, definitely recommend this hoodie design for anyone interested in techwear/cyberpunk hoodies.
Fit the part 💯

评论概述: Gave me the wrong colored sweater.
评论详情: They gave me the wrong color. This shows me how careless they are. The way they identify colors using letters can very easily be mistaken for other colors. I believe this is what happened to my order. It was supposed to come in purple. Look at another review as well, and you'll find that some people also received the wrong color. Overall, the sweater is comfortable and soft. Keeps me very warm and looks cool. Wish it was purple.

评论概述: Fabric of the Universe makes SOLID Techwear! Don't be deterred by the price.
评论详情: Had this hoodie for a while now, and I gotta say, it FEELS as good as it looks. This hoodie is surprisingly comfortable and warm. The fabric matches what I would associate with the price.  Do not be deterred by the price, this company makes solid stuff.  Too bad I brought mine to work and burned a whole in it with acid ): Side note: These do not resist strong acids haha

This is a really nice hoodie. Made with good material, its very soft. Def expensive but worth it in my opinion since ive had a black and white Obey hoodie for over four years its a nice upgrade. The strings are even nice too, the ends of them are metal. It was packaged nicely in a bag you can use for something else. Def an experience

I really like the style of the Fabric of the Universe clothing line and after owning a sweatshirt for a number of years, I picked up a new one. This one has a green color and similar markings on it. The material is thick and soft on the inside. The pocket is large and has the same soft feel. I also like the eyelets and aglets on the draw string. Overall a very nice sweatshirt.
I buy a lot of hoodies on Amazon but this one is the best ive felt. Lots of dumpy sad poorly stiched poor quality hoodies out there but its nice to see some people are doing it right.

评论概述: Bad Stitching on the Front Pocket
评论详情: As soon as I got this I wore it out and the stitching on the pocket started coming out at the corners. Bad quality stitching. had to get it resewn. Otherwise this is a very nice item and looks cool.

I got this hoodie and at first it was awesome, I loved how it looked, but after about 2 weeks of wearing it probably 3 times a week, the corners of the pocket started to come unsewn.  I also didn't really like their vision for the cuffs of their stuff. I think it's a company wide trend too, because I ordered a long sleeve shirt from them and the cuffs were fitted and made it tough to roll your sleeves up. I get that they have artwork on the sleeves, and it's pretty cool artwork, but I should also have the choice to roll them up if I need to get some stuff done.  I still gave them 3 stars because as far as asian streetwear goes, their designs are among the coolest.
They use a good quality sweatshirt for their designs. The hoodie strings are thicker than usual and I like it more than normal ones, it even has their logo on it. I would buy again :)
Nice and warm, looks awesome.
Very comfy and quality is pretty solid so far. Have been wearing it for the past two months so far.

This is my second hoodie purchase from Fabric of the Universe, and I LOVE it! Only complaint is the yellow lint it sheds, but it’s perhaps nothing a lint roller can handle. Will buy other styles in the future!
Very nice hoodie. I bought it for my son and he loves it. Definitely worth the money!

Loved the cyber graphics which was why i ordered it but it didnt fit me :/ yeah sad, but Ill be returning it and ordering a large instead of a medium. If ur going for that street slouchy vibe id order an xl.  Ok so details Around light to medium weight, fabric doesnt stretch, fleece on the inside, hood is double layered, the graphics have that really nice thick texture to them, and the hood stringys are pretty thick. A detail that i loved was the metal eyelets for the strings If 60 bucks for a sweater doesnt hurt ur bank then id recomend this piece especially if ur into cyberpunk street fashion.

评论概述: Extremely comfy, hood is thick but small.  Print quality seems good
评论详情: Ordered a 2xl expecting shrinkage, could have gotten an XL but hood is kind of small. Warmest zip hoodie I've ever owned and have been wearing it daily. Plan to order more from this brand if they release the Octavius model in zip up but will be keeping an eye on the brand for sure. 9/10
I should have wrote a review years ago I bought it in 2021 an still looks new to this day its a heavy jacket soo its great for winter. Other than that its very good quality

评论概述: Fits fine except for one thing

comparandola con capucheras de menor valor que he comprado ..en esta se nota una gran direncia respecto a su calidad el diseño muy bien elavorado es una buena prenda
I'm 6'3 220lbs XL fits perfect. I want another one!

I bought this for my 12 year old brother-in-law for Christmas and he absolutely loves it. If you have any idea how hard it is to get a preteens approval then you will understand the value in this comment.

amazing product I bought 2 hoodies and a mask. The quality of the fabric is very good. I'm very happy to see that there's affordable tech wear on Amazon. My only complaint is that I wish the mask was better quality. I'm a customer of 50/60 which is amazing but very pricey. I hope to see more clothes like this in the future since it's getting popular. 评论概述: excellent craftsmanship and quality of material.
评论详情: the sizing is perfect . the vinyl lettering is high quality , i dont have to worry about cracking or peeling. the only suggestion i have is turn it inside out for an initial cleaning as you will get fuzz from the inside of the hoodie on your clothes or hair or whiskers. i am impressed and cant wait to order again.

Material and zipper are decent. I’m 5’7 and 144lbs. Ordered an XXL for an oversized hoodie so I can wear my motorcycle gear under. It fits great except the length of the body is long for my height, so 4 stars for that. It’s great overall.

I love this hoodie! I ordered an XL, but I usually wear a L. The XL fits great. L would have been too small.. The pink is bright and stands out. My only complaint would be I haven't even had it a month and have washed it 1 time and come of the graphics are starting to peel up on the sleeve. Other than that, its a nice light, warm hoodie to wear!

This is a large.  I haven't washed it yet but most 100% cotton hoodies get uncomfortable tight after washing. Some not all.  I think the hoodie looks way better on the website or model than it does on me.  So far I've just used it to sleep in or hang around the house in.  I have hoodies that I love way more than this one

Hands down my favorite pullover hoodie. I wear it all the time. It’s super comfortable & has a deep hood which I love. I was worried it wasn’t going to fit around my curves so I ordered a 2XL and it’s perfectly oversized. Will def be ordering more hoodies from this company.

I ordered a size larger than I normally would and it ended up being true to size so if you want to order one, just get your usual size. Besides that, the fabric is warm. It's not like other printed hoodies on here, this one is thicker and feels higher quality.

While the designs are amazing(the off white look is quite nice), the biggest highlight is the material. The outside material is very heavy and high quality feeling, and the inside material is almost velvety and silky, and is very warm. The fit is great too, sizing is like any other hoodie.  Overall: -looks good -comfortable -warm -good sizing  I have no complaints so far
Great Quality and fits perfectly. The graphics are amazing! I would give it a 5 star, but I did receive the wrong color on my most expensive item.

This hoodie was purchased for my daughter, and she absolutely loves it. She wore it the entire day when she got it, and she didn’t want to take it off. Very good quality that runs true to size, I will be purchasing more hoodies in the future.
